snippet: Tips on creating additional FaceTime addresses under one Apple ID, and how to turn off message threading.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on tips for creating additional FaceTime addresses under one Apple ID, and how to turn off e-mail message threading; Tip of the Week notes shortcuts for deleting files or folders immediately.
